hadiths.text: A’ishah said:The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) often said while bowing and prostrating himself; “Glory be to Thee, O Allah, out Lord.” And “Praise be to Thee, O Allah, forgive me,” Thus interpreting the (command in the Qur’an)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الدُّعَاءِ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: The Supplication During The Ruku' And Prostration
